moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target frozen.

moves.name: Hang in There!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense and Sp. Def by 1 stat rank. Applies the Gradual Healing effect to the user.

moves.name: Icy Wind
moves.effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by 1 stat rank.

passives.name: Snow Shelter
passives.description: Protects the user from damage from a hailstorm.

passives.name: Stamina Reserves 2
passives.description: Charges the user’s move gauge by 2 the first time it is in a pinch each battle.

passives.name: Healing Hail 1
passives.description: Restores the user’s HP whenever its Pokémon takes an action during a hailstorm.
